Message Based Settings:Is 488.2 Compliant

Short name: Is 488.2

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: USB Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr

Returns whether the device is 488.2 compliant.

This property is not available for all instrument classes. For example, this property does not work with GPIB instruments. Use this property with VXI, GPIB-VXI, and USB instruments.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read Only
